## Description {#details}

This is a helper class used for handling formatted output.

It is the abstract base class of a templated derived class.

Definition at line 39 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/format-h">Format.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### print() {#a5b6aaf8cbdc3d3660bef42e1556908f1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::format&#95;object&#95;base::print (char &#42; Buffer, unsigned BufferSize) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Format the object into the specified buffer.

On success, this returns the length of the formatted string. If the buffer is too small, this returns a length to retry with, which will be larger than BufferSize.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/format-h/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/format-h">Format.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
